meanings.sent1: She put in a lot of effort to finish her project on time.
meanings.sent2: The team's effort in the game was truly commendable.
meanings.sent3: His effort to juggle while riding a unicycle was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The effort she put into her painting made it come alive.
meanings.sent5: The effort he exerted in climbing the mountain was evident in his tired smile.

meanings.sent1: After much effort, he finally solved the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The effort required to lift the heavy box was immense.
meanings.sent3: Her effort to stay awake during the boring lecture was futile.
meanings.sent4: The effort of running a marathon left him exhausted but satisfied.
meanings.sent5: The effort she put into her studies paid off with excellent grades.

meanings.definition: Something done by hard work or exertion
meanings.sent1: The delicious cake was the result of her baking effort.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful garden was a product of their gardening effort.
meanings.sent3: His effort to make the perfect cup of coffee ended in disaster.
meanings.sent4: The effort she invested in her friendships made her a beloved friend.
meanings.sent5: The effort he put into fixing the broken chair made it as good as new.
